accessibility.text: Objective: maximize the geometric “margin” between the separating hyperplane and the points that lay closest to that plane.
A hyperplane can be characterized by a vector,   , that is orthogonal to it, and a bias,   , expressing its distance from the origin,   .
The distance,       , from any point,   , to    has a nice closed form solution.
